Fill1.backgroundImage: linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 1%, #888 1%, #888 2%, transparent 2%), linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 1%, #888 1%, #888 2%, transparent 2%)

Linear1.comment: Linear gradient from white to pink to blue

Radial1.comment: Radial gradient from white to grey to blue

Linear2.comment: Linear gradient from blue to white

Linear3.comment: Linear gradient from top to bottom and from blue to white

Linear4.comment: Linear gradient from Red to grey to blue

Linear5.comment: Linear gradient from Orange to grey to blue

Radial2.comment: Radial gradient with cyan & purple (Adjust Position of Cyan and the Expansion)

Linear6.comment: Linear gradient from blue to Green to Orange (Adjust Rotation and Expansion)

Radial3.comment: Radial gradient from blue to white to blue (bottom to top)

Linear7.comment: Linear gradient from purple to cyan (right to left)

Linear8.comment: Linear gradient from white to dark blue

Radial4.comment: Radial gradient from red to yellow to green

Linear9.comment: Repeating linear gradient from blue to white

Linear10.comment: Linear gradient from yellow to orange to red

Radial5.comment: Radial gradient from white to black

Radial6.comment: Repeating radial gradient from blue to green

Linear11.comment: Linear gradient from green to pink

Linear12.comment: Linear gradient from purple to cyan

Radial7.comment: Radial gradient from pink to purple

Linear13.comment: Repeating linear gradient from red to white

Radial8.comment: Radial gradient from blue to white to blue

Linear14.comment: Linear gradient from red to yellow

Radial9.comment: Radial gradient from purple to blue

Pattern1.backgroundImage: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 20%, #ff4f70, transparent 30%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, #4e54c8, transparent 30%)

Pattern2.backgroundImage: linear-gradient(45deg, #3498db 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(-45deg, #3498db 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 75%, #3498db 75%), linear-gradient(-45deg, transparent 75%, #3498db 75%), linear-gradient(to bottom, #ff4757, #2f3542)

Pattern3.backgroundImage: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #ff4757, transparent), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, #2f3542, transparent), radial-gradient(circle at 90% 30%, #ff7e5f, transparent), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 80%, #ff5f6d, transparent)

Pattern5.backgroundImage: radial-gradient(circle, #ff5f6d 5%, transparent 5%), radial-gradient(circle, #ff1f93 5%, transparent 5%), radial-gradient(circle, #ff00d3 5%, transparent 5%), radial-gradient(circle, #ff00bf 5%, transparent 5%), radial-gradient(circle, #ff00a8 5%, transparent 5%)
